name: Mercenary Man
reviewBody:
David Knopfler is known to have a very fine grasp of irony. He wrote "The Bluffers Guide to the Rock Music Business" Oddly, it's actually a pretty good tune; especially for a movie that didn't look, prior to Blockbuster and DVD, like it had a prayer of finding any kind of distribution anywhere - least of all the major markets.

I think the adage "that was a good check" is appropriate for this one -----

There was a reference to "Shergar" - the BBC drama directed by the late Nigel Finch at this website - for which Knopfler is credited as having provided some underscoring - it seems to have vanished
